dcterms:creator: A. Nadkarni
S. G. Hofmann
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Facebook posts that provide insights into why people use Facebook, which can be utilized for understanding social media interactions.
dcterms:title: Facebook Posts Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Kinsella
A. Passant
J. G. Breslin
dcterms:description: A dataset used for classifying topics in social media posts based on metadata from hyperlinked objects, aiding in understanding event classification.
dcterms:title: Event Classification Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Cavalin
L. Moyano
P. Miranda
dcterms:description: A dataset containing life event posts on social media, used for developing a multiple classifier system to classify life events.
dcterms:title: Life Event Posts Dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Lassila
R. R. Swick
dcterms:description: A framework for representing information in the form of subject-predicate-object triples, used for knowledge representation in story generation.
dcterms:title: RDF Data for Story Generation

dcterms:creator: D. B. Lenat
M. Prakash
M. Shepherd
dcterms:description: A comprehensive knowledge base that utilizes common sense knowledge to assist in various AI applications, including story generation.
dcterms:title: Semantic Knowledge Bases

dcterms:creator: D. T. Ong
C. R. De Jesus
L. K. Gilig
J. B. Alburo
E. Ong
dcterms:description: A dataset containing event frames derived from social media posts, used for building a commonsense knowledge base for storytelling.
dcterms:title: Event Frames from Social Media Posts
